title: How to make pbe server account
body:
I want to make pbe account.
so I try this but It can't
How to make this account
Please tell me how to make it
u-u
I really want to make it

replies.body:
You can sign up from the [_NA PBE Signup Page_](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe). If you haven't already done so, I also recommend checking our [**PBE FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) out, for more info on how the system works and how we select testers.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
there is a site where u can apply for pbe. there you apply and then way some months/some years depending on how lucky you are
